title: "How Do You Build A Contender in Today’s NFL?”
description:
Kevin is joined by former Atlanta Falcons GM Thomas Dimitroff to discuss his life outside of the NFL, how contenders are built in the NFL and maneuvering around salary cap, CBA’s and star players as a NFL GM. 

Host: Kevin Clark 
Guests: Thomas Dimitroff 
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
